request.title: Pachelbel's Canon
request.comments: There is a longer (about 8'), better version that she does live, the extended middle secttion where she gives the melody to the left hand is really cool - but I can only find it on video :-( e.g. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-XSYQBBVcQ4 or https://www.discogs.com/master/1957447-Hiromi-Hiromi-Solo-Live-At-Blue-Note-New-York
